CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . D.L.F. and PERSON were the owners of a flat in GPE , which they had let to GPE
CARDINAL . In a registered letter of CARDINAL DATE , they informed the tenant that they intended to terminate the lease on expiry of the term on DATE and asked him to vacate the LOC by DATE .
CARDINAL . In a writ served on the tenant on DATE ORG and PERSON reiterated their intention to terminate the lease and summoned the tenant to appear before the Florence Magistrate .
CARDINAL . By a decision of CARDINAL DATE , which was made enforceable on DATE , the Florence Magistrate upheld the validity of the notice to quit and ordered that the LOC be vacated by DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant became the owner of the apartment .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant served notice on the tenant requiring him to vacate the premises .
CARDINAL . On DATE , she served notice on the tenant informing him that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on DATE .

CARDINAL . DATE and DATE , the bailiff made CARDINAL attempts to recover possession . After the third attempt , the applicant decided to discontinue the enforcement proceedings because of the lack of police assistance .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant made a statutory declaration that she urgently required the premises as accommodation for her own use .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant served notice again on the tenant requiring him to vacate the premises .
CARDINAL . On DATE , she served notice on the tenant informing him that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on CARDINAL DATE .

CARDINAL . Between CARDINAL DATE and DATE , the bailiff made CARDINAL attempts to recover possession . Each attempt proved unsuccessful , as , under the statutory provisions providing for the staggering of evictions , the applicant was not entitled to police assistance in enforcing the order for possession .
CARDINAL . Following a friendly settlement , in DATE the tenant vacated the LOC .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is described in the ORG ’s judgment in the case of ORG GPE [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , ORG CARDINAL-V.
